articles.author: Antony Sguazzin
articles.title: Government pension fund freezes R70 billion mandate with PIC - News24
articles.description: The Government Employees Pension Fund, Africa’s biggest pension fund, said it may take as long as a year to negotiate a new mandate with Public Investment Corporation that will allow it to enter into new unlisted investment deals.
